mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_email, me_birth, me_gender, me_authority) values(#{m.me_id},#{m.me_pw},#{m.me_email},#{m.me_birth},#{m.me_gender},1)
mapper.select: select me_id from member where me_birth= #{m.me_birth_str} and me_email = #{m.me_email}
select * from member where me_birth= #{m.me_birth_str} and me_email = #{m.me_email}
mapper.update: update member set me_pw = #{m.me_pw}, me_gender = #{m.me_gender}, me_birth = #{m.me_birth}, me_email = #{m.me_email}, me_authority = #{m.me_authority} where me_id = #{m.me_id}
mapper.select: select * from member where me_session_id = #{session_id} and me_session_limit > now()
